item.title: DRT Bus Experience Design for Tourists
item.description: Introduction This project is a group work with three other students. Team Leader: Xiangyu Xiao (me)ï¼šAs the team leader, I am responsible for the overall project management, data analysis, determining the main features, prototype iteration, and video production. Team members: Jingkun Wei: Responsible for the user reseach Mengze Cai: Responsible for making the prototype, user evaluation and reflection Rhys Taylor: Responsible for the design book UN Goal background The goal for this project is UN Goal No.
